00028 #define BITSHIFT(x) 1 << x
00029 #define BITSHIFT2(x,y) x << y
00030 
00031 struct AnimationType;
00032 class Control;

00035 //enums used for animation
00036 
00037 enum {
00038         TRANSLATEX = BITSHIFT(0), TRANSLATEY, TRANSLATEXY, TRANSLATEZ, TRANSLATEXYZ = BITSHIFT2(0x07, 0),   \
00039         ROTATEX = BITSHIFT(3), ROTATEY = BITSHIFT(4), ROTATEXY = BITSHIFT2(0x03, 3), ROTATEZ = BITSHIFT(5), ROTATEXYZ = BITSHIFT2(0x07, 3),   \
00040         ROTATEORGX = BITSHIFT(6), ROTATEORGY = BITSHIFT(7), ROTATEORGXY = BITSHIFT2(0x03, 6), ROTATEORGZ = BITSHIFT(8), ROTATEORGXYZ = BITSHIFT2(0x07, 6),   \
00041         ROTATESCREENX = BITSHIFT(9), ROTATESCREENY = BITSHIFT(10), ROTATESCREENXY = BITSHIFT2(0x03, 9), ROTATESCREENZ = BITSHIFT(11), ROTATESCREENXYZ = BITSHIFT2(0x07, 9),   \
00042         REDCHANNEL = BITSHIFT(12), GREENCHANNEL = BITSHIFT(13), RGCHANNEL = BITSHIFT2(0x03, 12), BLUECHANNEL = BITSHIFT(14), RGBCHANNEL = BITSHIFT2(0x07, 12), ALPHACHANNEL = BITSHIFT(15), RGBACHANNEL = BITSHIFT2(0x0F, 12),   \
00043         ORIGIN = BITSHIFT(16)
00044 };
